aka: Death Will Come and Shall Have Your Eyes

cast.name: 安帕罗·诺格拉 Amparo Noguera

awards:
第67届圣塞巴斯蒂安国际电影节(2019)
　　金贝壳奖(提名) 何塞·路易斯·托雷斯·雷瓦

writer.name: 何塞·路易斯·托雷斯·雷瓦 José Luis Torres Leiva

director.name: 何塞·路易斯·托雷斯·雷瓦 José Luis Torres Leiva

this_title: Vendrá la muerte y tendrá tus ojos
trans_title: Death Will Come and Shall Have Your Eyes
introduction: Two women who have shared a lifetime together are faced with the disease of one of them. The sick woman decides not to follow any treatment and they both move to a small house in the forest until the day death comes to their lives.
foreign_title: Vendrá la muerte y tendrá tus ojos
